item.description:
Online registration has closed
You Can Still Buy Your Tickets at the Door!

Table Seating is available on a first come, first served basis.
Full Tables are sold out.

See you tonight!

We will also be having a Much Needed Toy Drive at the Gala! --- Read below for more info! ----


The END OF YEAR Holiday SALSA Gala
presented by Masacote

Come celebrate the holiday season Salsa Dancing the night away!

-- Door Prizes (Wear RED to be entered!)
-- Finger Food
-- Free Salsa Lessons
-- Salsa Performances
-- Salsa Dancing

8-9pm FREE Beginner Lesson
8-9pm FREE Ladies' Styling Intermediate Lesson with Ana Masacote

9pm-Close Salsa Dancing to the great sounds of DJ Rob Suave, of Ryles Jazz Club's Salsa Sundays!

10 pm: Special Performances...
-- Masacote Dance Company's Newest Dancers
-- "Afterlife" by Masacote Dance Company
-- Hacha y Machete Training Group

Cover: Only $8 All Night; $10 table seating
RESERVE TABLES ONLINE
NEW TO SALSA? Sit at the MEETUP TABLE!
Sign Up Online THROUGH THE MEETUP SITE And meet with other members of the group!




NEW! Holiday Toy Drive!

We have heard that due to the status of the economy, many organizations are not meeting their goals of Christmas Cheer. So, we've decided to set up a toy drive at the gala to help them out!

Bring an unwrapped, unused toy to the Holiday Salsa Gala and receive a ticket to be entered into the raffle.

Bring 2 Toys, and get 2 tickets!

Bring 3 toys, and get 3 tickets!

Bring...well, you get the picture...

Toys will be donated to Our Place, a shelter/support organization for children of Homeless families. For more information on Our Place, visit:
http://www.cmarket.co...





Door Prizes:
-- 2 FULL Passes to Flava Invasion 4 in Atlanta April 24-26, 2009, valued at $220 www.flavainvasion4.com
-- Registration for 1 to one of the 2009 Masacote Intensive Salsa Sessions, valued at $175 (www.masacoteentertainment.com)*
-- A Pass for Salsa Glam's New Year's Gala in Montreal, valued @ $70 www.salsaglam.com
-- The Masacote Holiday Gift Basket (Includes 3 items from our store), valued @ $90 (www.masacoteentertainment.com/news.html)
-- Instructional Salsa DVDS
-- Salsa Music CDs

How to enter into Door prizes?
1) Show up @ the door wearing red
2) Attend the Free Salsa Lesson
3) Reserve Table Seating!
4) Bring a toy for the toy drive. Get a ticket for EACH toy!
The more you do, the more chances you have to win!



NEW TO SALSA? Sit at the MEETUP TABLE!
Sign Up Online THROUGH THE MEETUP SITE And meet with other members of the group!

OR!! Reserve your own table online for only $64 and invite your friends to join you! Tables seat up to 8 people.

Purchase Tickets & Reserve Seating today!
http://www.masacoteen...

Location: Knights of Columbus; 75 W School St; Charlestown MA, 02129

Company Website: http://www.masacoteen...

* Session prize can be applied to a session in 2009. Not applicable to Ana Masacote's January Styling Session. Non transferrable.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be teaching the Ladies' Styling Class! I'll be wearing red :)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: The End of Year Holiday SALSA GALA and TOY DRIVE!
